entry.def: Soviet is used to describe something that belonged or related to the former Soviet Union.
The Soviets were the people of the former Soviet Union.

example.ex: In 1957, the Soviets launched Sputnik 1 into outer space.
example.tran: 1957 年，苏联人将“斯普特尼克1号”人造卫星送入了外层空间。

entry.def: A soviet was an elected local, regional, or national council in the former Soviet Union.
